name: Vineet Shukla
body:
Download as PDF ###Professional Highlights * Experience delivering products from ideation phase in both web & mobile space on latest concepts * Experience executing visioning exercises with multiple stakeholders at different levels (both internal and external) * Experience working closely with SMEs to develop products * Experience working on large scale distributed agile projects * Proven ability to collaborate with multiple stakeholders across different departments * Experience consulting clients and internal teams on agile practices and product roadmap * Experience managing both T&M and Fixed Price projects * Proven PM skills: from creating project plans to leading teams, consistently meeting deadlines and delivering business values * Passion for keeping up with emerging trends * Experience in managing opportunities (pre-sales activities) from different regions * Experience working with start-ups, SMEs and large corporations * Experience working in multiple countries (US, UK, India, Brazil & Singapore) ###Professional Skills
Skill Level
Product Management Advanced
Business Analysis Expert
Scope Management Advanced
Agile Practices Expert
Project Management Advanced
Stakeholder Management Advanced
Opportunity Management Expert
Portfolio Management Beginner
Technical Know-how Intermediate
###Experience
Organization Duration Location
ThougthWorks Technologies Jan, 2009 - till date Gurgaon
Enzen Technologies Oct, 2007 - Jan, 2009 Bangalore
Tata Consultancy Services Oct, 2006 – Oct, 2007 Bangalore
Wipro Technologies Sept, 2004 – Oct, 2006 Bangalore
KCC Sept, 2003 – Sept, 2004 Bangalore
###Educational Qualifications PGDMM: Bangalore University
MSc. IT: Kuvempu University
BCA: Bangalore University
###Passport details Passport Number: F3175101
Passport Expiry Date: 15th June 2015
Have valid B1 and UK ICT Tier 2 visas

Gurgaon - 122002
